description: Tommy hasn't had enough time to stroke himself off in quite a while.Luckily for him, he had some spare time the other day to show himself some love.Tommy loves the scenery at this new house we've been shooting at lately, so what better place is there to get off than a spot with a great view. Tommy gets comfortable on one of the living room chairs while he watches one of his favorite xxx DVDs.He has a great time. Forgetting what it was like to get himself off, he'll definitely have to sneak off for personal time a little more often.Enjoy!
title: Tommy Is Spanking His Dick Good
